SELECT c.id,c.title, CAST(c.`price` AS DECIMAL(38, 2)) AS price ,c.`cover`,c.`lesson_num` AS lesson, cd.`description`, t.`name` AS teacherName, s1.`title` AS levelOne,s2.`title` AS levelTwo
FROM edu_course c LEFT JOIN edu_course_description cd ON c.`id` = cd.`id` LEFT JOIN edu_teacher t ON c.`teacher_id` = t.`id` LEFT JOIN edu_subject s1 ON s1.`id` = c.`subject_parent_id` LEFT JOIN edu_subject s2 ON s2.`id` = c.`subject_id` WHERE c.`id` = #{id}
